original_text: The people of other nations heard news about your beauty. That was because of all the good things that I had given you to make you very beautiful. That is what the Almighty Lord says.
korean_text: 네 화려함으로 말미암아 네 명성이 이방인 중에 퍼졌음은 내가 네게 입힌 영화로 네 화려함이 온전함이라 나 주 여호와의 말이니라

sentences.original_text: The people of other nations heard news about your beauty
sentences.korean_translation: 다른 민족 사람들이 당신의 아름다움에 대한 소식을 들었나이다

sentences.original_text: That was because of all the good things
That is what the Almighty Lord says
